funding-group.funding-statement: This research was supported by National Institutes of Health (NIH) grants AI25489 (RBT, SCW) and AI077796 (APA). The field work was also supported in part by a grant from Consejo Nacional de Ciencia y Tecnolog√≠a (grant no. 69692) to FJRA. The funders had no role in study design, data collection and analysis, decision to publish, or preparation of the manuscript.
